short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Analyzes and rewrites web content for selected grade level.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transforming web content to match specific grade levels, this Chrome extension facilitates educational accessibility. Through meticulous analysis, it tailors online material to suit varying cognitive abilities and reading levels. Employing strategies like simplifying language and integrating visuals, it ensures comprehension and engagement across different age groups. Aligned with educational standards, it enhances learning experiences by breaking down complex concepts and adhering to curriculum objectives. By adapting web content, it fosters a conducive environment for effective learning and academic success.
